extension.description: If you use Klaus Schmidingers VDR http://www.tvdr.de to create TV recorings, you can use this plugin to watch them in KODI. You do need access to the file system where the VDR recordings are stored, e.g. using NFS. A running VDR is not required during playback of the recordings with this plugin.
